comment.author: 80878055@N00
comment._content: Loughgall village, County Armagh. The Cope who commissioned the photograph would probably have been a member of the family who lived in the Manor House, Loughgall and were the local landlords.

thanks for taking the time to add information.
it's helpful to those of us on an ancestry hunt.

comment._content: The image has now been reversed. Thanks for pointing this out, NIreland eye!
